description: Upgraded Java from 17 to 21, reducing processing latency by 20% and leveraging modern language features for improved performance and scalability.
Engineered backend components for an application monitoring dashboard using Java and Spring Boot, enabling real-time performance visibility and telemetry tracking

Implemented key enhancements, including restricting pipeline execution on holidays via the holiday list API for better system reliability and developing a centralized telemetry tracking system to ensure accurate data retrieval across multiple projects.
Fixed some critical bugs from frontend-side, enhancing functionality and improving user experience for thousands of daily users.

Developed a feature using Java, Apache Spark, and SQL to identify and alert when unusual patterns or threshold violations repeat within short time intervals, helping detect potential fraud or misuse in real time.
Optimized code and refactored key components, leading to faster application performance and better codebase organization.
